migrations.description: Split global configuration files into individual project.json files. This migration has been added automatically to the beginning of your migration set to retroactively make them work with the new version of Nx.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Add node_modules to root eslint ignore
migrations.name: add-eslint-ignore

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v12. Cypress 12 contains a handful of breaking changes that might causes tests to start failing that nx cannot directly fix. Read more Cypress 12 changes: https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-12-0.This migration will only run if you are already using Cypress v11.
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-12

migrations.description: Split global configuration files (e.g., workspace.json) into individual project.json files.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Creates or updates webpack.config.js file with the new options for webpack.
migrations.name: react-webpack-config-setup

migrations.description: Set the mode in configurations to match the configurationName.
migrations.name: set-mode-in-configurations

migrations.description: Update @nrwl/vite:test reportsDirectory and outputs properties to point to correct paths.
migrations.name: update-test-path-placeholder-vars

migrations.description: Update `@nrwl/web/babel` preset to `@nrwl/js/babel` for projects that have a .babelrc file.
migrations.name: update-babel-preset

migrations.description: Removes es2015Polyfills option since legacy browsers are no longer supported.
migrations.name: remove-es2015-polyfills-option

migrations.description: Creates or updates webpack.config.js file with the new options for webpack.
migrations.name: webpack-config-setup

migrations.description: Add the babelUpwardRootMode option to the build executor options.
migrations.name: add-babelUpwardRootMode-flag
